title: Kristen & Dax: Home for the Holidays (90 seconds)
description:
From wearing matching PJ’s and sweaters to over-the-top decorating, Kristen Bell and Dax Shepard know how to do it big for the holiday season. This year, they’re inviting you over to ring in the holidays with their family. For more information on the Galaxy Family

Music: "Sleigh Ride" by The Ronettes, from a "Christmas Gift For You from Phil Spector"

asset.author: Samsung Mobile USA
asset.hookText:
From wearing matching PJ’s and sweaters to over-the-top decorating, Kristen Bell and Dax Shepard know how to do it big for the holiday season. This year, they’re inviting you over to ring in the holidays with their family. For more information on the Galaxy Family, head to http://www.facebook.com/samsungmobileusa

Music: "Sleigh Ride" by The Ronettes, from a "Christmas Gift For You from Phil Spector"

transcripts:
[MUSIC PLAYING] Yes. Let the holiday season begin. I'm on the roof. You're on the oven. 

Hun I can't even tie my shoes at this point. 

OK. I'll tie your shoes. I'll go in the attic and I'm on the roof. Finding some gems up here. Who is this little girl? 

Stay focused, please. 

Bingo. Merry Christmas. 

Just bring him downstairs. 

Come on it's lovely weather for a sleigh ride together with you. 

[MUSIC PLAYING] 

How's it going up there? Do you have enough lights? 

Yeah. I don't know if we have enough roof. 

You think a little more snow would make it look real? 

OK. So a fall blizzard. 

[MUSIC PLAYING] 

Hey don't eat the decorations. Supposed to be helping. 

I am. I'm making a fire. 

Well that might be to close to the tree huh? What is that? 

It's mistletoe. Deal with it. 

It's cheating. 

Yeah, right. 

[LAUGHING] 

Hi did you find everything? I got enough bread to carb load an elephant. I got some overpriced nuts. And some things wrapped in white paper. 

And some of the tiny pickles. 

Only the tiniest. 

Come on. 

Come on, Pat. 

You guys aren't even going to give thanks? 

Ready? 

Ready. Oh It's beautiful. You know what this gets me in the mood for? 

Oh absolutely. I can watch this 1,000 times. 

Me too.
